title: The Boss’s Obsession
description: I’ll never accept her resignation, only her surrender.RonanI have it all. Success, riches, and an assistant I’m obsessed with by my side for as many hours as I can manage.Until she hands in her notice.It started as a favor to her dying father and grew into an obsession.I’ve watched her heal from her loss for a year, biding my time.Now, she says she needs to live more and work less. She wants the chance to meet someone.She hasn’t realized that I’m the only man in her life, and I don’t intend on allowing that to change.
author: Gia Bailey
